Processor_Usage.Query: Perf | where Computer in ({0}) | where ObjectName == "Processor Information" | where CounterName == "% Processor Time" | summarize Value = avg(CounterValue) by Computer | project avg = 0, Value , Computer, Status = iff(Value> 80, 0,2)
Processor_Usage.Tooltip: Unhealthy:More than 80% in the last 30 minutes.

FreeDisk_Space.Query: Perf | where Computer in ({0}) | where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" | where CounterName == "% Free Space" | summarize (TimeGenerated, Value)=arg_min(TimeGenerated,CounterValue) by Computer | project avg = 0, Value , Computer, Status = iff(Value < 20, 0, 2)
FreeDisk_Space.Tooltip: Unhealthy:Less than 80% in the last 30 minutes.

Disk_Queue_Time.Query: Perf | where Computer in ({0}) | where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" | where CounterName == "Avg. Disk Queue Length" | where InstanceName == "C:" | summarize (TimeGenerated, Value)=arg_min(TimeGenerated,CounterValue) by Computer | project avg = 0, Value, Computer, Status = iff(Value > 5, 0, 2)
Disk_Queue_Time.Tooltip: Unhealthy:Less than 80% in the last 30 minutes.

Memory_Page_Faults.Query: Perf | where Computer in ({0}) | where ObjectName == "Memory" | where CounterName == "Available MBytes" | summarize (TimeGenerated, Value)=arg_min(TimeGenerated,CounterValue) by Computer | project avg = 0, Value, Computer, Status = iff(Value < 500, 0, 2)
Memory_Page_Faults.Drilldown: Perf | where Computer == {0} | where ObjectName == "Memory" | where CounterName == "Available MBytes"
Memory_Page_Faults.Tooltip: Unhealthy:Less than 1GB in the last 30 minutes.

Response_time_for_machine.Query: Perf | where Computer in ({0}) | where ObjectName == 'User Input Delay per Session' | where CounterName == 'Max Input Delay' | where CounterValue != 0 | summarize (TimeGenerated, Value)=arg_min(TimeGenerated,CounterValue) by Computer | project avg = 0, Value, Computer, Status = iff(Value > 2000 , 0, 2)
